data.title: Hiccups
data.text: I've been to this hotel a few times but can't figure out for the life of me why they can't get things right!  I was there on a weekend when there were lots of weddings so I understand being busy but my room was freezing and I got no response at all.  The toilet kept having issues, no maintenance.  Towel bar was broken, no one fixed it.  They had a difficult time keeping up with towels at the pool.  It seems to me they need additional staff on the busy weekends.  One person can't do it all and do it well.

data.title: Kids Birthday Party
data.text: I stayed in a 2 bedroom suite, room 229.  The second bedroom was very cold. There was no heat coming in , other then a after market  6 inch duct through the wall coming off the main heater in the room. I could feel cold air coming through the window. Comforter was very thin. Wi  Fi was not very strong, no Wi Fi at all in the pool area.

data.title: Beautiful rooms.  Great price.
data.text: Beautiful, spacious rooms.  Internet works great.  Culver's (Burger place) is literally just outside the doors. Quiet. The breakfast was superior to other hotels I have stayed in.  We would recommend and definitely return!

data.title: Newly remodeled
data.text: Very nice, clean and pleasantly decorated. 1st time staying here and would stay again!  We were here for a wedding and we received a nice group rate. Nice to stay in a newly remodeled hotel with very clean smell.

data.title: Wedding Suite
data.text: I used Best Western Plus for my wedding, We had some bumps in the road in the planning process, but BWPlus did everything in their power to make it right and I was very satisfied.  We had a maintenance problem the night of our stay, and the night manager was wonderful.  Dennis Gumke was wonderful! Very nice.

owner_response.author: DennisGumke, General Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS Blaine At The National Sports Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
It was very kind of you Janalyn for being so understanding about your wedding experience.  I know the team works very hard, but it is those little things that we need to do better so you are able to fully enjoy the buildup to your special day.  We hope to lead the hotel in Superior Customer Care and showing we are "People Who Care".  I can assure you I have taken note and will be providing the training the team to spot those little things before they have a big impact on our guests stay.  
Warm regards,
Dennis Gumke
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice stay and very affordable
data.text: Had a nice stay in Blaine, MN.  I played a round of golf at TPC Twin Cities.  The hotel is very near the golf course.  Best Western upgraded my stay at no additional cost.  The hotel was very nice, clean, and spacious.  The staff was very accommodating and friendly.  I recommend staying at this hotel.

data.title: Wedding
data.text: My favored nephew  got marred. Was the best time, I ever had on vacation. I really enjoyed myself. I am so glad ,I could be apart of it. We enjoyed the mall. The worlds  biggest mall. It was great. Everything went great, really love seeing every one, all in one place again. We must do it again.

data.title: Military friendly, very welcoming and helpful staff!
data.text: My family and I were moving to the area due to a military move. We ended up staying in the hotel for 2 weeks while we found a new house. The hotel crew was nice and always took time to say hello and talk to my wife and kids to make the stay more enjoyable, almost like staying with family. The morning breakfasts were better than most hotels I've ever stayed in. I will definitely recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the area!

owner_response.author: DennisGumke, General Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS Blaine At The National Sports Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Our team and myself would like to say thank you for the words of encouragement for the hard work they put in.  We know how important your time is and it is very rewarding to hear that our hotel is doing its part in making Best Western a leader in providing Superior Customer Care.  My goal as the general manager of our hotel is that our team is known as being "People Who Care".  There are many great hotels in our area and we appreciate you giving us the opportunity to have you as our guest.  
Warm regards,
Dennis Gumke
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Stay in Minnesota
data.text: Our stay at Best Western was awesome!  Right from checking in to end of our stay, it was a pleasure dealing with front desk and all other staff.  Our room was new and so clean and cozy...made our stay very enjoyable and comfortable!   We wouldn't stay anywhere else if coming back for a visit.

data.title: Great stay...would have enjoyed staying longer!
data.text: Great hotel, great breakfast, homey, clean rooms, and wonderful staff!   We would highly recommend!   The bed was very comfortable and we liked having a refrigerator and microwave in the room.   The wifi worked great and enjoyed having the closet!

owner_response.author: DennisGumke, General Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS Blaine At The National Sports Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking some of your valuable time to help our team and myself to hear about your stay.  The team and myself appreciate your kind words.  We know there are many great hotels in the area to choose from and it was great we had the opportunity to have you as one of our valued guests.
Warm regards,
Dennis Gumke
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wonderful and accommodating!!
data.text: I traveled here with my family and was incredibly pleased with my stay. I have 3 children and they absolutely loved the arcade room as well as the pools!!!! Everywhere in this hotel was clean and updated. The rooms were just amazing and my whole family couldn't have been happier with our stay. My husband enjoyed the fitness center and they had a HUGE breakfast that had more selections than most hotels offer. Location was very handy and the staff is friendly and helpful. Will recommend this hotel to friends and family for sure.

owner_response.author: DennisGumke, General Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS Blaine At The National Sports Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Our team and myself appreciate all the wonderful comments about your stay.  You are a positive ambassador in promoting the services our hotel offers.  Our hope is that all of our guests have a wonderful stay and that something is taken away as part of a lasting memory.  
An area that we have been working on recently is our fitness room and in the next couple of weeks all of our equipment is being upgraded to the latest models available.  Should you return your husband will be able to enjoy his fitness routine even further.  
Warm regards,
Dennis Gumke
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great room and service
data.text: Room was clean, comfortable and quiet.  Check in was quick and easy.  There is parking all around the hotel but vehicles with trailers or large vehicles (e.g. moving vans) might have trouble finding space if the hotel is full.  It was at 1/3 capacity when I checked in so plenty of parking space was available.  Best Western has a great rewards program if you have their credit card as well and they will match elite status with other hotel chains.

owner_response.author: DennisGumke, General Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS Blaine At The National Sports Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Our team and myself would like to thank you for having the opportunity to have you as our guest.  We hope that our team and myself are able to represent the city of Blaine in a positive way and that our guests encounter a trouble free stay.  

You are a great ambassador for Best Western Hotels and it is great to know that you are  very pleased with the Best Western Rewards Program. 

We have a great working relationship with our area businesses and very often large trucks and equipment use the lot just to our North to have ample room to park their equipment without blocking additional spaces for our guests.  The front desk is able to direct any guests that are in this situation so that you may park worry free.  

If you are in our area again in the future we hope that our hotel will be highly considered.

Warm regards,
Dennis Gumke
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wedding
data.text: I used this hotel for myself and wedding guests. It was a nice hotel with plenty of options for breakfast. The bridal suite is very nice and we received complementary Champaign from the hotel for our wedding. My guests and I took advantage of the shuttle service. The general manager was very nice. Only hiccup in the road was the hotel had gone through at least 3 people who were in charge of group blocks so every time I would need to make a change nothing ever got changed or completed. Thankfully the last person who I had talked to took care of the issues that the others didn't. A few of the front desk staff members came across as annoyed when I talked with them mainly the ladies, I don't not have names because that was the least of my worries on my wedding day.

owner_response.author: DennisGumke, General Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS Blaine At The National Sports Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
On behalf of the team and myself we would like to thank you for having the opportunity to have your wedding guests stay with us.  It was unfortunate that our team had changed since our original booking.  There are many challenges in that particular roll and it is my hope that that person is able to rise to those challenges.  As the General Manager it is my full responsibility to ensure that everything goes smooth on your day.  I do very often get involved with the weddings as I am able to ensure that everything is in order for your arrival.  

Your feedback is valuable and I will be sure to take your remarks and implement them to become better in the future.  My goal as the hotel manager is that our team is known as "People Who Care".  

Warm regards,
Dennis Gumke  
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Hotel/Awful Coffee
data.text: The hotel was wonderful. It was clean and the beds were great. The coffee offered at breakfast was instant coffee. It was undrinkable. We had to get in the car to find coffee. My advice: Ditch the coffee dispenser and brew your coffee.

owner_response.author: DennisGumke, General Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS Blaine At The National Sports Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for letting us know about your view on the coffee.  We are very pleased to say that this coffee is not an instant coffee as mentioned.  We get many great reviews in particular about the coffee and I appreciate that we cannot be comparable to the many specialty coffee shops springing up everywhere.    The brand we use is a very popular European brand and is also served at some of these specialty shops.  This brand has received so much positive exposure in the United States that one of the top coffee makers has purchased this line of coffee recently to market as part of their own brand.  It would have been great to have the opportunity to be able to assist you during your stay to allow me to have a better understanding.  Had their been a malfunction in the machine or temporarily out of order.  There are times that the breakfast area can become very busy and something may have been missed.  The staff are very accommodating to ensure things are corrected if brought to their attention.  

We are pleased that the rest of your stay has been enjoyable.  The team works very hard to ensure that our guests are well looked after.  My goal as the hotel manager is that our team is known as "People Who Care".  

Warm regards,
Dennis Gumke
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Recent stay at Blaine Best Western
data.text: Overall a very nice stay at the Best Western  at Blaine, MN.   The staff was excellent--very friendly and helpful.  We were there to attend a wedding, and everyone there  for the event was impressed by how accommodating everyone was.  We even had use of a private room for breakfast!  We would definitely stay there again.

owner_response.author: DennisGumke, General Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS Blaine At The National Sports Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Our team and myself would like to take this time to thank you for letting us know about your stay.  Weddings can be a challenge for any hotel, because each one is very different and has different expectations.  It is wonderful that we were able to assist your wedding guests in having breakfast together.  I thought this was a very good suggestion and it is something that I will look forward to having again with future wedding parties.  
There are many great hotels and wedding venues in our area and we appreciate that you gave us the opportunity to play a part in the special day.
Warm regards,
Dennis Gumke
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Not up to par
data.text: It's a good hotel in a convenient location. The staff is friendly and anxious to please. Unfortunately they had plenty of opportunities to try. I won't cover the details since I provided the hotel manager with a complete listing but there were a number of items which required fixing. And we are talking about non-traditional things going wrong. Hopefully our visit was an anomaly and your stay will go smoother.

owner_response.author: DennisGumke, General Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS Blaine At The National Sports Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you Steve for taking some of your valuable time to meet with me and discuss your stay.  I have used these things as a training tool to assist the team in making the adjustments so that other guests do not have the minor annoyances that you experienced during your stay.  I am pleased though that you did find our staff friendly because I do see how hard they work each day in making sure our hotel is considered the best Blaine has to offer.  
Warm regards,
Dennis Gumke
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent staff
data.text: The staff here were excellent. They are really friendly and helpful. They have gone out of their way to give us excellent service. I will definitely be staying here again. I will be staying at Best Westerns whenever I travel.

owner_response.author: DennisGumke, General Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS Blaine At The National Sports Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
We are very pleased that you have enjoyed your stay and that our team was able to assist you with all your needs.  We know there are many great hotels to choose from in our area and appreciate that you have given us the opportunity to have you as our guest.  It is great to hear that you will show your continued support for Best Western Hotels as I know that as a company we are improving every day.  We look forward to having you back to our hotel in the future.
Warm regards,
Dennis Gumke
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best Western Blaine Minnesota
data.text: Hotel was very nice. Decorated nice.  The staff was very helpful and courteous.  Breakfast was displayed well and always full.  I would highly recommend this hotel.  This hotel is close the city and a lot of area attractions.  There are also quiet a few restaurants near by, some even in walking distance.

owner_response.author: DennisGumke, General Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS Blaine At The National Sports Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
It is wonderful to hear you promote our city.   It is through our guests reviews that we realize how much we have to offer any guests coming to the Minneapolis/St Paul area.  Our staff work very hard so that we represent the very best in Blaine.  
It was great to hear that you have enjoyed the breakfast.  It is an area that is very important to me for your guests and I am continually looking at ways to make it the best on offer in our area. 
Warm regards,
Dennis Gumke
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: excellant
data.text: We were very pleased with this hotel. We were in town for eye surgery and the location was great. Price was discounted for people staying having surgery.  I was very comfortable at this motel!! Would stay again!!

owner_response.author: DennisGumke, General Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS Blaine At The National Sports Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Thank you for taking some of your valuable time to let us know about your stay.  It is great to hear that our local companies are helping to promote our local business.  There are several businesses in our area that work in partnership to promote our wonderful city.  It is very important that our guests when they do choose to stay at our hotel we are known as having "People Who Care". 
Warm regards,
Dennis Gumke
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Unbelievably Fantastic Experience! Terrific Employees Genni, John, Matthew !
data.text: It started with Genni helping Me with my reservation, She was AWESOME!  She was the most helpful, very friendly, who had a great attitude and terrific personality! I cant say enough about her and My experience that would do her justice. I will always be a customer because of her and hope others get to experience the complete customer satisfaction that I received. Thank You! Also adding to My terrific stay were John and Matthew who are number 1 professionals at there job and treated Me like royalty. They were very friendly, knowledgeable and helpful.  I cannot say enough about these 3 employees  and wish everyone has the Fantastic experience that I had during My stay at the hotel;  I'm positive that they will. Thank You Again, Genni, John, Matthew, You're The BEST! I highly recommend staying here, Matter of fact, I had a opportunity to stay at 5 star hotel in Boston and decided to stay at a Best Western Plus solely because of these 3 employees and my experience at there hotel. To Me, they are a 6 Star Hotel ! Thank You, I will see You all soon!

owner_response.author: DennisGumke, General Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS Blaine At The National Sports Center, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Genni would like me to pass on a thank you that you recognized her for her outstanding service during your stay.  She is a great asset to our team and shows that our hotel shows our city as a great place to visit.  It is my goal as the general manager that our team is known as having "People Who Care".  
Warm regards,
Dennis Gumke
General Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response
